channel.title: Services on Rosehip Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Rosehip Studio

item.title: Custom Software
item.description: At the current time Rosehip Studio is working on iOS applications and websites using the Svelte framework. TastyMap TastyMap is Rosehip Studio’s first product to jump into the realm of software that connects and clarifies people’s food preferences. Working Together Please get in touch if you’d like to collaborate! We’re interested in design and technology that: Actually solves a problem Changes the world for the better Has minimal impact on the environment Is functional and beautiful

item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: Data Visualization is the practice of taking data and using visual design to create clear and accurate represenations of the data in a way that lends itself to greater understanding. Objectives Financial accounting and financial reporting are often used as synonyms. According to International Financial Reporting Standards: the objective of financial reporting is: To provide financial information that is useful to existing and potential investors, lenders and other creditors in making decisions about providing resources to the reporting entity.
